info.name: Cone-Traced Supersampling (CTSS)
info.description:
Cone Traced Super Sampling (CTSS) for SDF-based geometry.

September 2023:
-CTSS with Delayed shading
-Subpixel Edge Reconstruction  (when enabled, ~60 second compile time, disabled by default)

June 2023:
-Added simple Sponza + primitives scene
